product_name: Oakley RSVP Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Blending iconic 1950's style with HD-polarized technology, these chic and sleek sunglasses make summer cruising a breeze with squint-free sun protection and impact-resistant frames.
